Residential Education and Campus Housing
Division of Student Affairs


















 
Move Out 2023


Students, please be aware that the deadline to move out is 24 hours after your last final. Students who have a final on Friday of Finals Week are required to move out no later than 11:00 a.m. on May 20, 2023. Before you move out, make sure to change your mailing address, recycle, donate, and, throw away trash, and restore your residence. For more information, visit the Move Out webpage.



  






You are hereREACH Home ›  
Resident Services & Resources






This section is all about information for residents who currently are living on campus.
Newsletters
Two Residential Education and Campus Housing publications are distributed monthly in an effort to help sort through some of the more important issues surrounding the student's contract with Residential Education and Campus Housing.
myRC Newsletter
Each month during the academic year the Residential Education and Campus Housing Office publishes a newsletter for the residents called myRC e-Newsletter. It is sent to the resident's SSU email. Residents are automatically registered for this newsletter when they move in.
Parent e-Newsletter
Every month the Housing Office publishes a newsletter for the parents. The Parent e-Newsletter is an email announcement service and requires a subscription to the newsletter. Online sign-up for this publication is available at Parent Information.
